list.expr: sum by (pod, container) (changes(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])) > 0
list.name: Container restart

targets.expr:
max by(pod, uid, node, container, name, image) (
  # kube-state-metrics sometimes prints different image_spec for the same container ID,
  # which causes errors with duplicate entries.
  # This is probably related to using AdvancedDaemonSet from OpenKruise
  max by(namespace, pod, uid, node, container, name, image) (label_replace((
    # when pod name is the same (for example, for static pods, like kube-apiserver)
    # sometimes kube-state-metrics updates only UID, while still keeping old container_id
    # which leads to many-to-one matching in join queries like this one
    # topk(count_over_time) ensures that we pick metrics that were present for the longest interval
    # container_id!="" is required to skip containers that never started because of failed dependency, like image pull failed or mounted configmap/secret missing
    topk by(namespace, pod, uid, node, container, container_id, image) (1, count_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container_id!=""}[$__range]))
    or
    topk by(namespace, pod, uid, node, container, container_id, image) (1, count_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container_id!=""}[$__range]))
  ), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)")) * 0
  + on(namespace, pod, container, name) group_right(uid)
  max without(uid) (last_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__range]))
)

round(max by(pod, container, name) (
  timestamp(container_last_seen{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"})
  -
  container_last_seen{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}
  or
  time() - last_over_time(container_last_seen{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__range])
))

max by(uid, container, exit_code) (last_over_time(reason:kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_timestamp{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
* 1000

options.content:
This dashboard is intended to debug issues with a particular container.

When pod has many containers, and all are shown, most graphs will be hard to read.

To make it more readble you can:
- Select a single container
- Disable "Show limits"
- DIsable "Split IDs"

If you want a summary about the pod, go to `Namespace / Pods` dashboard and select a single pod.
There is a `Namespace` link in the upper right to do this quickly.

targets.expr:
min by(pod) (
    (kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Failed"} == 1) * 2
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"} == 1) * 3
    or
    (
        kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"} == 1
        and on(namespace, pod)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 4
    or
    (
        kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"} == 1
        and on(namespace, pod)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 0
    ) * 5
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Succeeded"} == 1) * 6
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Unknown"} == 1) * 7
)

min by(container) (
    (
        kube_pod_container_status_waiting{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
    ) * 3
    or
    (
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and
        kube_pod_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
    ) * 4
    or
    (
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == bool 0
        and
        kube_pod_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
    ) * 5
    or
    (
        (kube_pod_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1)
        and
        kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_exitcode{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 0
    ) * 6
    or
    (
        (kube_pod_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1)
        and
        kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_exitcode{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} != 0
    ) * 2
    or
    # for some reason I don't see kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_exitcode on some job containers
    (
        (kube_pod_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1)
    ) * 8
)

(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"} == 1) * 0
+ on() group_right
min by(container) (
    (
        kube_pod_init_container_status_waiting{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
        and on(namespace, pod, container)
        kube_pod_init_container_status_waiting_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}
    ) * 3
    or
    (
        kube_pod_init_container_status_waiting{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
    ) * 3
    or
    (
        kube_pod_init_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
        and
        kube_pod_init_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
    ) * 4
    or
    (
        kube_pod_init_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} != 1
        and
        kube_pod_init_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1
    ) * 5
    or
    (
        (kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1)
        and on(namespace, pod, container)
        kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", reason="Completed"} == 1
    ) * 6
    or
    (
        (kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"} == 1)
        and on(namespace, pod, container)
        count by(namespace, pod, container) (
            kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", reason!="Completed"} == 1
        ) > 0
    ) * 2
    or
    (
        (kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1)
    ) * 8
)
$__to / 1000 - max by(container) (max_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
max by (pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

time() - max by(container, name) (last_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__interval]))
or
time() - max by(container) (last_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__interval]))

sum by(container, name) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))

max by (container, name) (
  (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
)
or
max by (container) (
  (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
)

max by (container, name) (
  (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  sum without(cpu) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-12)
)
or
max by (container) (
  (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  sum without(cpu) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-12)
)

max by (container, name) (
  (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
)
or
max by (container) (
  (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
)

max by (container, name) (
  (rate(container_cpu_cgroup_burst_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
)
or
max by (container) (
  (rate(container_cpu_cgroup_burst_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
)

# if container didn't run at some interval, you will have division by zero, so we do ` / increase + epsilon`
max by (container, name) (
  (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
/
  (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-5 )
)
or
max by (container) (
  (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
/
  (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-5 )
)

# if container didn't run at some interval, you will have division by zero, so we do ` / increase + epsilon`
# sometimes burst reporting is alightly misaligned with cadvisor reporting,
# and you get non-zero burst with (zero+epsilon) cfs_periods, which results in peak at ~1e5
# using clamp_max fixes this, although overall result can be a bit inaccurate
clamp_max(
  max by (container, name) (
    (increase(container_cpu_cgroup_burst_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
  / on(container, name)
    (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-5 )
  ),
1)
or
clamp_max(
  max by(container) (
    max by (container, name) (
      (increase(container_cpu_cgroup_burst_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) )
    / on(container, name)
      (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-5 )
    )
  ),
  1
)

sum by(container, name) (rate(container_pressure_cpu_stalled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(container) (rate(container_pressure_cpu_stalled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container, name) (rate(container_pressure_io_stalled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(container) (rate(container_pressure_io_stalled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container, name) (rate(container_pressure_cpu_waiting_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(container) (rate(container_pressure_cpu_waiting_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container, name) (rate(container_pressure_io_waiting_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(container) (rate(container_pressure_io_waiting_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container, name) (rate(container_pressure_memory_stalled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(container) (rate(container_pressure_memory_stalled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container, name) (rate(container_pressure_memory_waiting_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(container) (rate(container_pressure_memory_waiting_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content:
- `rss` is anon memory
- `wss` = rss + active cache
- `raw` = `rss` + full cache + kernel
- Cache is active if it used _often_ (more than once?)

What to look for:
- WSS reaching limit causes file garbage collection
- RSS reaching limit causes OOM kill

targets.expr: max by (container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$enableLimits})
max by (container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$enableLimits})

panels.description: You are encouraged to select a single container to make this graph easier to read.

targets.expr:
max by (container, name) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_max_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}
)
/ on(container) group_left
max by (container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))
or
max by (container) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_max_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}
)
/
max by (container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))

max by (container, name) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}
)
/ on(container) group_left
max by (container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))
or
max by (container) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}
)
/
max by (container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))

max by (container, name) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}
)
/ on(container) group_left
max by (container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))
or
max by (container) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}
)
/
max by (container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))

max by (container, name) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_rss{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}
)
/ on(container) group_left
max by (container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))
or
max by (container) (
  max_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__interval])
  or
  container_memory_rss{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}
)
/

panels.title: memory / request: $container

panels.description: You are encouraged to select a single container to make this graph easier to read.
panels.title: memory / limit: $container

targets.expr:
max by (container, name, failure_type)(rate(container_memory_failures_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid!=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
or
max by (container, failure_type)(rate(container_memory_failures_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", invalid=$split_ids}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(interface) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(interface) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))

sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))

sum by(container, device) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"})
or
sum by(pod) (ephemeral_storage_pod_usage{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"})

sum by(pod) (kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"})
-
sum by(pod) (kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"})
sum by(container) (kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by(container) (kube_summary_container_rootfs_used_bytes{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.description: Absolute values will change based on time scale, because it's showing total increase over an interval.

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{container!="", container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000

panels.title: logs written

targets.expr: max by(pod, volume_name) (ephemeral_storage_container_volume_usage{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

list.definition: query_result(label_replace(label_join(      last_over_time(        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]      )    * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()      max by (namespace, pod, uid) (        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])      )  * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)    max by (namespace, pod, uid, node) (      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",node!=""}[$__range])    ),  "human_name",  "/",  "node",  "pod"),  "human_name",  "$2 ($1)",  "human_name",  "(.*)/(.*)"))
list.description:
label_replace(
label_join(
      last_over_time(
        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]
      )
    * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()
      max by (namespace, pod, uid) (
        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
      )
  * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)
    max by (namespace, pod, uid, node) (
      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",node!=""}[$__range])
    ),
  "human_name",
  "/",
  "node",
  "pod"
),
  "human_name",
  "$2 ($1)",
  "human_name",
  "(.*)/(.*)"
)
list.label: pod
list.name: pod

query.query: query_result(label_replace(label_join(      last_over_time(        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]      )    * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()      max by (namespace, pod, uid) (        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])      )  * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)    max by (namespace, pod, uid, node) (      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",node!=""}[$__range])    ),  "human_name",  "/",  "node",  "pod"),  "human_name",  "$2 ($1)",  "human_name",  "(.*)/(.*)"))

list.definition: query_result(label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "main/$1", "container", "(.*)")or (  (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"}[$__range]) == 1) * 0  + on(uid) group_right label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "init/$1", "container", "(.*)")))
list.description:
label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "main/$1", "container", "(.*)")
or 
(
  (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"}[$__range]) == 1) * 0
  + on(uid) group_right 
label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "init/$1", "container", "(.*)")
)
list.label: container
list.name: container

query.query: query_result(label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "main/$1", "container", "(.*)")or (  (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"}[$__range]) == 1) * 0  + on(uid) group_right label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "init/$1", "container", "(.*)")))

list.definition: query_result(label_replace((last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])or last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)"))
list.description:
label_replace(
(
last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range])
or 
last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range])
), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)")
list.name: container_name

query.query: query_result(label_replace((last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])or last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)"))
